name: aws-api-project
description: Serverless API project using AWS free tier services

scripts.install:all: npm install && cd infra && npm install && cd ../model && npm install && cd ../local-dev && npm install && cd ../service && mvn clean install
scripts.test:integration: bash -c 'cd /Users/bernardo/Dropbox/_CODE/TestAWSAPI/aws-api-project/local-dev && node server.js & SERVER_PID=$!; sleep 5; cd /Users/bernardo/Dropbox/_CODE/TestAWSAPI/aws-api-project/integration-tests-java && mvn test -Dapi.base.url=http://localhost:3000; TEST_EXIT_CODE=$?; kill $SERVER_PID; exit $TEST_EXIT_CODE'
scripts.deploy:dev: cd service && mvn package && cd ../infra && npx cdk deploy DevApiStack
scripts.deploy:staging: cd service && mvn package && cd ../infra && npx cdk deploy StagingApiStack
scripts.deploy:prod: cd service && mvn package && cd ../infra && npx cdk deploy ProdApiStack
scripts.diff:dev: cd infra && npx cdk diff DevApiStack
scripts.diff:staging: cd infra && npx cdk diff StagingApiStack
scripts.diff:prod: cd infra && npx cdk diff ProdApiStack
scripts.destroy:dev: cd infra && npx cdk destroy DevApiStack
scripts.destroy:staging: cd infra && npx cdk destroy StagingApiStack
scripts.destroy:prod: cd infra && npx cdk destroy ProdApiStack
